name: ProPresenter 6 Playlist Bundle
summary: Learn about .PRO6PLX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: A playlist in ProPresenter allows users to organize individual presentations, songs, videos, and other content to assemble a multimedia production. When a user exports a playlist, ProPresenter creates a PRO6PLX file to store the playlist.

You will most likely only encounter PRO6PLX files if you use ProPresenter to display complex presentations and export a playlist. You may also receive a PRO6PLX file from another ProPresenter user looking to share his playlist.
To export a playlist as PRO6PLX file, click the playlist, then select File → Export Playlist.... To open a PRO6PLX file, select File → Import → Import File....
NOTE: ProPresenter is used to assemble various types of visual productions for sporting events, concerts, church worship services, and conferences.
